memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, int queueSize, int blockingCallbacks, const char *NDArrayPort, int NDArrayAddr, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize, int maxThreads=1)
memberdef.name: NDPluginStats

briefdescription.para: Constructor for NDPluginStats; most parameters are simply passed to NDPluginDriver::NDPluginDriver.

detaileddescription.para:
After calling the base class constructor this method sets reasonable default values for all of the parameters.
portName
The name of the asyn port driver to be created.
queueSize
The number of NDArrays that the input queue for this plugin can hold when NDPluginDriverBlockingCallbacks=0. Larger queues can decrease the number of dropped arrays, at the expense of more NDArray buffers being allocated from the underlying driver's NDArrayPool.
blockingCallbacks
Initial setting for the NDPluginDriverBlockingCallbacks flag. 0=callbacks are queued and executed by the callback thread; 1 callbacks execute in the thread of the driver doing the callbacks.
NDArrayPort
Name of asyn port driver for initial source of NDArray callbacks.
NDArrayAddr
asyn port driver address for initial source of NDArray callbacks.
maxBuffers
The maximum number of NDArray buffers that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited number of buffers.
maxMemory
The maximum amount of memory that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited amount of memory.
priority
The thread priority for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
stackSize
The stack size for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
maxThreads
The maximum number of threads this driver is allowed to use. If 0 then 1 will be used.

briefdescription.para: Callback function that is called by the NDArray driver with new NDArray data.

detaileddescription.para:
Does image statistics.
pArray
The NDArray from the callback.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynInt32->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynFloat64->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.
These include Min, max, mean, sigma X and Y centroid and sigma Histogram
